name: Tailwind UI Rules
rules: Use Tailwind CSS classes for styling
Implement responsive design using Tailwind's responsive modifiers
Create reusable components for common UI elements
Use @apply directive in CSS files for complex, repeating class combinations
Follow atomic design principles: atoms, molecules, organisms
Use Tailwind's design tokens for consistent spacing and colors
Implement dark mode support using class-based strategy
Use Tailwind plugins for extended functionality
Optimize bundle size by purging unused CSS classes
